summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 between a PayPal law enforcement analyst and an unidentified recipient regarding the fulfillment of subpoenas for records related to Jeffrey Epstein. The analyst confirms processing a request under case reference 791064 and offers to be the point of contact for future requests.

persons.name: Ashley Betzhold
persons.role: Analyst, Global Law Enforcement Fulfillment at PayPal
persons.context: PayPal employee who located and fulfilled subpoena requests for records related to Jeffrey Epstein (case reference 791064) and offered to be the point of contact for the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose financial records were being subpoenaed from PayPal/Venmo, referenced by case number 791064.

connections.description: Betzhold, as a PayPal analyst, was fulfilling law enforcement subpoenas for financial records related to Epstein.

events.title: Initial PayPal subpoena fulfillment
events.description: Ashley Betzhold from PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team confirms she received and fulfilled a request for records related to Jeffrey Epstein (case reference 791064).

events.title: Follow-up on PayPal/Venmo subpoenas
events.description: An unidentified party confirms that attached subpoenas for PayPal/Venmo records were submitted for processing via the PayPal Portal earlier that day.

keyFacts: PayPal received and fulfilled law enforcement subpoenas for financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein under case reference 791064.
The correspondence indicates an active financial investigation into Epstein was ongoing as of August-September 2019.
Ashley Betzhold of PayPal's Global Law Enforcement Fulfillment team served as the point of contact for these subpoena requests.
The subpoenas targeted records from both PayPal and Venmo payment platforms.
